Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration

Items.Title: Oversight - Preparing Asylum Seekers and Migrants for the Workforce.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Preparing Asylum Seekers and Migrants for the Workforce.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enhancing the IDNYC application process

Resolution calling on the United States Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) and the Secretary of Homeland Security to grant humanitarian parole, of at least two years, to asylum seekers who entered the United States prior to the date this parole is announced.
Items.MatterName: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) and the Secretary of Homeland Security to grant humanitarian parole, of at least two years, to asylum seekers who entered the United States prior to the date this parole is announced.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on United States Citizenship and Immigration Services to quickly clear the backlog of I-765 applications for employment authorization.
Items.MatterName: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services to quickly clear the backlog of I-765 applications for employment authorization.
